column2:
"After defeating the Devil Castles along the way
and foiling Lutz's plans, the Milita advances
towards the capital."

"With no one to stop them, our heroes have finally
reached their destination on the outskirts of the
capital, where Lutz awaits."

"Harriet looks onwards towards a familiar structure.
Beyond its walls, a place she once called home."
"Cuent Castle... How nostalgic. And inside, there we shall find Lutz...?"
"He cast judgment on his closest associates. He used them and he now pays the price for it."
"He is foolish, having lost sight of everything after being used by the Devil Castles... and Ephimera."
"He is, without a doubt, beyond help... To think that I would encounter someone who is farther gone than I was."
